pageContext.claim: “Governor Ron DeSantis suspends the horrible Sheriff Scott Israel who is largely responsible for the errors leading up to Parkland Shooting. A man of action, on his first day going after the cowards of Broward!”
pageContext.analysis: Gov. Ron DeSantis (R-Fla.) was sworn in on Jan. 8. He suspended Israel on Jan. 11. DeSantis said Israel “egregiously failed in his duties” by not maintaining “a culture of toughness."
